name: Tunnel Rats (itch)
description:
"Ensign! Glad to have you here! Your mission is simple. We have received intelligence of a MEGA-worm tunnel located in our sector. My orders are for you to delve deep into the abyss and collect its riches. Godspeed!"

An arcade action/shooter/miner made in under 48h for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo.

Download for some rad graphics and fullscreen.

Fonts:

Rainy Hearts by Camellina

Retro Gaming by Daymarius
